title: 80s videogame bitmapped blackletter
content:
I can't figure out which font is used here:   
   
 [http://www.terra.es/personal2/emumanu/temp/cpc60001.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20111214114808/http:/www.terra.es/personal2/emumanu/temp/cpc60001.png)   
   
please help me!   
   
Thank you very much.
author: anonymous

comments.content: The face is as poor as the prose...!

[http://www.xpaider.com/index\_2.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20111214114808/http:/www.xpaider.com/index_2.html)   
   
Try Xpaider Gothic not exact but fairly close

thanks for the reply.   
   
yes, it's from a videogame of 80's and I know the resolution is poor but I have searched myfonts.com with blackletter and i haven't seen any font with the same 'Y' as the link I provided. There are fonts very similar, but I haven't found the same. Maybe it was a custom modification?   
   
Thanks anyway.

It looks to me like the sort of bitmap 'fonts' that were used in video games in the 70's and early 80's. I think not much relation to present day fonts, which are much higher resolution.   
   
Do a search at MyFonts.com with the word 'Blackletter', and you will see many similar digitial fonts, of much higher quality.
